name: search-backend
description: Production-ready backend with Node.js, Express, Supabase, Contentstack, and OpenAI

scripts.test:connection: node -e "const cs = require('./services/contentstack'); cs.getContentTypes().then(() => console.log('✅ Connection OK')).catch(e => console.error('❌ Connection failed:', e.message))"
scripts.health: node -e "const http = require('http'); http.get('http://localhost:3000/api/health', res => res.statusCode === 200 ? console.log('✅ Healthy') : console.log('❌ Unhealthy'))"
